question: Vittalaswamy and Hazara Ramaswamy temples at Vijayanagar were built by which of the following?
explanation: Krishna Deva Raya built some fine stone temples. The most famous among them areÂ  Vittalaswamy and Hazara Ramaswamy temples at Vijayanagar. He also got many temples repaired and added impressive gopurams or gateways to many important South Indian temples.
